resource.description:

{{vars.item['id']}} {{vars.item['status']}} {{vars.item['category']}} {{vars.item['alert_class']}} {{vars.item['devices_count']}} {{vars.item['alert_type_name']}} {{vars.item['detected_time']}} {{vars.item['updated_time']}}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
   {
      "title":"Pull Alerts Created or Updated in Last X min",
      "required":true,
      "editable":true,
      "visible":true,
      "type":"integer",
      "name":"fetch_alerts_in_last_X_minutes",
      "tooltip":"Specify the timeframe in minutes to pull the alerts for the first time."
   },
   {
      "title":"Alert Category",
      "name":"category",
      "type":"text",
      "tooltip":"Specify the Alert category you want to filter Alerts",
      "required":false,
      "editable":true,
      "visible":true
   },
   {
      "title":"Limit",
      "name":"alert_limit",
      "type":"integer",
      "tooltip":"Specify the number of Alerts you want to ingest. Maximum value can be 5000. Leave the field blank to ingest all the alerts",
      "required":false,
      "editable":true,
      "visible":true
   }
]

data.description: Claroty xDome is a modular, SaaS-powered industrial cybersecurity platform that scales to protect your environment and fulfill your goals as they evolve.
